name: miles of repaved road

links.linkText: Status of the Nationâ€™s Highways, Bridges, and Transit: Conditions & Performance (23rd Edition) (PDF)

notes: This study presents a range of prices per mile of repaved lane depending on urban population -- for this app, those prices were averaged, resulting in $612,000 per lane.
Then, we multiplied this by 2 to get the cost of repaving one mile of 2-lane road: $1,224,000.

name: new playgrounds

links.linkText: Cost Analysis for Improving Park Facilities to Promote Park-based Physical Activity (website)

notes: We used the price listed in this study for a small playground: $100,000 to construct, plus $5,000 maintenance. A small playground describes a single prefabricated play structure or swing set.

name: studio apartments
notes: This figure represents the average cost for 12 months of rent in a studio apartment -- that's one year of comfortable housing for an individual or small family.
Averages for each city are taken from the Jan 2020 data provided by Apartment List, which takes steps to avoid the biases of websites like apartments.com.
Note that Oakland, CA is not represented by the dataset, and instead uses the state average.

name: years of groceries

links.linkText: USDA Food Plans: Cost of Food Report for JANUARY 2020 (PDF)

notes: From this report, we used the numbers for a month's worth of low-cost groceries for a family of two ($499.80) and a family of four ($857.70) and derived the average ($679).
When multiplied by 12, this gives us an estimate for a year's worth of groceries for a family of 2-4 people ($8148).
